data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Mayurbhanj, Odisha, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mayurbhanj, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Mayurbhanj, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Mayurbhanj, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Mayurbhanj.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Karmali people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Mayurbhanj to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Mayurbhanj, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mayurbhanj, Odisha, India has a population of 2,519,700.

We estimate Mayurbhanj has 27,717 people who might know Jesus, 30,572 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,461,411 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Mayurbhanj.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
